languages.text: Мейв на удивление быстро прижилась на борту флагмана, а ее доброта и нежный нрав тронули сердца экипажа. Один статный офицер оказывал девушке знаки внимания, но та неизменно отклоняла ухаживания, пряча за высокими воротниками и шалями уродливые следы от темного ритуала, произошедшего на Тассере. Когда влюбленный мужчина смог получить согласие Мейв на брак, его ждал кровавый кошмар: в час церемонии невеста обратилась порождением Хаоса, и тварь вдоволь пировала на осколках светлых надежд под вопли ужаса и отчаяния, пока не была умерщвлена прибывшими блюстителями. Говорят, что исчадие, истекая кровью, пыталось напевать на удивление нежную мелодию и звало кого-то по имени Дан.

traits.locale_text: Мейв на удивление быстро прижилась на борту флагмана, а ее доброта и нежный нрав тронули сердца экипажа. Один статный офицер оказывал девушке знаки внимания, но та неизменно отклоняла ухаживания, пряча за высокими воротниками и шалями уродливые следы от темного ритуала, произошедшего на Тассере. Говорят, что исчадие, истекая кровью, пыталось напевать на удивление нежную мелодию и звало кого-то по имени Дан.

languages.text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. When Maive's suitor at last secured her consent to marry, little did he know that he was walking into a blood-soaked nightmare: just before the ceremony, his bride-to-be transformed into a Chaos spawn. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.
languages.original_text: Мейв на удивление быстро прижилась на борту флагмана, а ее доброта и нежный нрав тронули сердца экипажа. languages.text: Maive, sancak gemisindeki hayata şaşırtıcı derecede hızlı bir şekilde alıştı, kibarlığı ve nazik doğasıyla mürettebatın yüreğine dokundu. Gösterişli bir subayın romantik ilgisine maruz kalsa da Maive, Thassera'da gerçekleşen karanlık ayinin çirkin izlerini yüksek yakaların ve şalların ardına saklayarak bu girişimleri reddetti. Maive'i talibi nihayet evlilik için onun rızasını aldığında ise kana bulanmış bir kâbusa daldığının farkında değildi. Müstakbel gelin, törenden hemen önce Kaos'un dölüne dönüştü. Korku ve çaresizlik dolu çığlıklar arasında yaratık, infazcılarca öldürülene dek paramparça olmuş umutlarla karnını doyurdu. Kanlar içinde yattığı sırada ise şaşırtıcı derecede yumuşak bir melodi tüttürmeye çalıştığı ve Daen adındaki birine seslendiği söylenir.
languages.original_text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. When Maive's suitor at last secured her consent to marry, little did he know that he was walking into a blood-soaked nightmare: just before the ceremony, his bride-to-be transformed into a Chaos spawn. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.

languages.text: Maive s'est habituée étonnamment vite à vivre à bord du vaisseau et l'équipage s'est pris d'affection pour cette jeune femme aimable et douce. Quand un officier fringant lui a fait des avances, elle l'a tout d'abord éconduit, en cachant derrière des châles et des cols montants les marques du sombre rituel qui avait eu lieu sur Thassera. Le prétendant a fini par convaincre Maive de l'épouser, sans se douter que ses noces se solderaient par un bain de sang : juste avant la cérémonie, sa future femme s'est transformée en rejeton du Chaos. Dans un concert de hurlement d'horreur et de désespoir, la créature s'est gorgée d'espoirs brisés jusqu'à ce que les prévôts parviennent à l'abattre. On raconte qu'avant de mourir, elle a essayé de chanter une chanson étonnamment tendre en prononçant le nom de Daen.
languages.original_text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.

languages.text: メイヴは驚くほど早く旗艦での生活に馴染み、その優しさと穏やかな性格はクルーたちの心を打った。ある魅力的な士官が恋心を告げたが、メイヴは彼のアプローチを拒んだ。タッセーラで行われた暗黒の儀式によって生じた醜い痕跡を高い襟やショールで隠していたのだ。メイヴの求婚者はやがて結婚の同意を得たが、まさか血に染まった悪夢に足を踏み入れることになるとは知らなかった。式の直前、新婦となるはずのメイヴがケイオススポーンへと変貌したのだ。恐怖と絶望の叫びの中、その化け物は砕かれた希望をむさぼり尽くし、駆けつけたエンフォーサーの部隊によって討たれたと言われている。倒れたその化け物は意外にも優しい旋律を口ずさみ、ダエンという名の誰かを呼んだという。
languages.original_text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. When Maive's suitor at last secured her consent to marry, little did he know that he was walking into a blood-soaked nightmare: just before the ceremony, his bride-to-be transformed into a Chaos spawn. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.

languages.text: 梅芙很快适应了旗舰上的生活，她的善良与温柔打动了众多船员的心。一位英俊潇洒的军官向她袒露爱意，但梅芙却拒绝了他的求爱。她雅致的礼服之下，隐藏着塔瑟拉那场黑暗仪式留下的可怖烙印。当那位追求者终于赢得了她的芳心，即将踏入婚姻的殿堂时，他丝毫没意识到，自己正在走向一场血腥的噩梦。结婚典礼开始前，他未来的新娘突然变成了混沌魔物。在恐惧与绝望的呼喊声中，这只怪物吞噬着破灭的希望，最终被赶来的执法者杀死。据说，当这只怪物浑身是血，躺在地上时，它口中吟唱着一首极其温柔的歌谣，呼唤着某个叫做“达恩”的人。
languages.original_text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. When Maive's suitor at last secured her consent to marry, little did he know that he was walking into a blood-soaked nightmare: just before the ceremony, his bride-to-be transformed into a Chaos spawn. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.

languages.text: Maive se adaptó de forma sorprendentemente rápida a la vida en la nave insignia, y su amabilidad y naturaleza gentil se ganó los corazones de la tripulación. Un galante oficial dejó claras sus intenciones románticas, pero Maive lo rechazó, ocultando bajo cuellos altos y chales las marcas del siniestro ritual que la había desfigurado en Thassera. Cuando el pretendiente de Maive por fin la convenció para que se casara con él, no sabía la sangrienta pesadilla que lo esperaba. Justo antes de la boda, su novia se transformó en un engendro del Caos. Entre gritos de desesperación y horror, el monstruo se atiborró de esperanzas rotas hasta que fue abatido por el personal de seguridad. Se dice que mientras se desangraba, el monstruo entonó una canción sorprendentemente tierna mientras llamaba a alguien llamado Daen.
languages.original_text: Maive settled into life aboard the flagship surprisingly quickly, and her kindness and gentle nature touched the hearts of the crew. One dashing officer made his romantic interest known, but Maive spurned his advances, hiding behind high collars and shawls the disfiguring marks of the dark ritual that had taken place on Thassera. When Maive's suitor at last secured her consent to marry, little did he know that he was walking into a blood-soaked nightmare: just before the ceremony, his bride-to-be transformed into a Chaos spawn. To the cries of horror and despair, the creature gorged itself on shattered hopes until it was slain by the arriving enforcers. It is said that, as the creature lay bleeding, it tried to sing a surprisingly tender tune and called out to someone named Daen.

Un galante oficial dejó claras sus intenciones románticas, pero Maive lo rechazó, ocultando bajo cuellos altos y chales las marcas del siniestro ritual que la había desfigurado en Thassera. Justo antes de la boda, su novia se transformó en un engendro del Caos. Entre gritos de desesperación y horror, el monstruo se atiborró de esperanzas rotas hasta que fue abatido por el personal de seguridad. Se dice que mientras se desangraba, el monstruo entonó una canción sorprendentemente tierna mientras llamaba a alguien llamado Daen.

languages.text: Maive gewöhnte sich erstaunlich schnell an das Leben auf dem Flaggschiff und berührte mit ihrer Freundlichkeit und ihrem sanften Wesen die Herzen der Crew. Ein schneidiger Offizier machte ihr Avancen, aber Maive wies ihn ab und verbarg die entstellenden Male des dunklen Rituals, das sie auf Thassera erdulden musste, mit hohen Krägen und Schals. Als Maive schließlich einer Hochzeit zustimmte, wusste ihr Verehrer nicht, dass ihm ein blutgetränkter Albtraum bevorstand, ehe sich seine zukünftige Braut kurz vor der Zeremonie in eine Chaosbrut verwandelte. Begleitet von entsetzten und verzweifelten Schreien labte sich die Kreatur an zerstörten Hoffnungen, bis sie vor den eintreffenden Enforcern erschlagen wurde. Es heißt, als die Kreatur in ihrem Blut lag, stimmte sie eine überraschend sanfte Melodie an und rief einen gewissen Daen.
